script.name: Menu.PC
script.description: Menu: Main menu on special reports

line.text: 'Register your ship as a cargo hauler'
'Unregister your ship as a cargo hauler'
'You must pilot a TP to register as a taxi'
'You are no longer accepting taxi passengers'
'Upgrading your taxi will double your income.'
'You must pilot a TS to register as a cargo hauler'
'You must be registered as a cargo hauler to access this manifest.'
'The debug section will be permanently hidden. Continue?'

sval.val: Menu: Main menu on special reports
Register your ship as a taxi
Unregister your ship as a taxi
Register your ship as a cargo hauler
Unregister your ship as a cargo hauler
You must pilot a TP to register as a taxi
You are now accepting taxi passengers
You are no longer accepting taxi passengers
Upgrading your taxi will double your income.
You must pilot a TS to register as a cargo hauler
You are no longer accepting cargo
You must be registered as a cargo hauler to access this manifest.
The debug section will be permanently hidden. Continue?
